product.title: Herstyler Super Styler 1.25" Ceramic Flat iron Hair Straightener Flat Iron
product.description: PREMIUM HAIR STRAIGHTENER: This 1.25 inch flat iron hair straightener gives you lasting, cascading silky tresses. This energizing booster benefits your hair in myriad ways. Get besotted! FRIZZ-FREE STYLING : The Herstyler Forever replenishes hair making it frizz-free and silken in texture. A power-horse large flat iron that’s worthy of you. Let your hair breathe easy! NEGATIVE ION TECHNOLOGY: Negative ion technology treats frizz to like magical moonbeams. Manage your hair with ease with the long swivel cord. Have a field day with your shimmering new hair. DUAL VOLTAGE: This black flat iron heats up to 460 degrees F. Its compatible dual voltage offers the best protection to your hair from all damage. Your simply astounding hair may well cause! CERAMIC PLATE TECHNOLOGY: This straightener with adjustable temperature is the genie in the bottle to give you dazzling straight hair. A whole new world awaits to emulate your style!

product.description_full:
PREMIUM HAIR STRAIGHTENER: This 1.25 inch flat iron hair straightener gives you lasting, cascading silky tresses. This energizing booster benefits your hair in myriad ways. Get besotted! FRIZZ-FREE STYLING : The Herstyler Forever replenishes hair making it frizz-free and silken in texture. A power-horse large flat iron that’s worthy of you. Let your hair breathe easy! NEGATIVE ION TECHNOLOGY: Negative ion technology treats frizz to like magical moonbeams. Manage your hair with ease with the long swivel cord. Have a field day with your shimmering new hair. DUAL VOLTAGE: This black flat iron heats up to 460 degrees F. Its compatible dual voltage offers the best protection to your hair from all damage. Your simply astounding hair may well cause! CERAMIC PLATE TECHNOLOGY: This straightener with adjustable temperature is the genie in the bottle to give you dazzling straight hair. A whole new world awaits to emulate your style! *   * INSPIRING HAIR STRAIGHTENER: This 1.25 inch ceramic straightening iron gives you cascading straight tresses that stay with you for long. Step up your style with this evolutionary flat iron.
   
   
 *   * DEFINES FRIZZ-FREE HAIR: This compelling flat iron for hair replenishes hair to make it frizz-free and silken in texture. A power-horse hair straightener par excellence. Let your hair breathe easy!
   
   
 *   * NEGATIVE ION TECHNOLOGY: A great retainer of hair moisture, this dual flat iron for hair treats frizz to effect. The long swivel cord helps manage the hair effortlessly! No knotty affair here!
   
   
 *   * DUAL VOLTAGE: This Superstyler Onyx ceramic flat iron hair straightener heats up to 5000F. It protects hair from damage for you to it style it the way you want. A well-groomed mane to cause chaos!
   
   
 *   * URBANE HAIR TOOL: This pro hair straightener spoils you with a range of styling options. Straighten or curl your hair in dazzling ways. Time you got those heads turning your way!

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
